Package com.jackstockley.AddressBookREST

Class Helper

java.lang.Object
com.jackstockley.AddressBookREST.Helper
public class Helper
extends java.lang.Object
This part of the program helps with random tasks to make the program function Part of the functions are logging and allowing for any data or time searching on the database
Version:
2.6
Author:
jnstockley

  • Method Details

    • log

      public static java.lang.String log​(java.lang.Exception e, java.lang.String object, java.lang.String method)
      Takes an exception from a try catch method and print the error message to a log file in the current directory of the program
      Parameters:
      e - The error message from a try catch
      object - The object or class the error message came from
      method - The method or function the error message came from
      Returns:
      A string formatted with the error message, object, method, and date of error

    • log

      public static java.lang.String log​(java.lang.String e, java.lang.String object, java.lang.String method)
      Take an exception as a string and prints the error message to a log file in the current directory of the program
      Parameters:
      e - A hard coded error message in the program
      object - The object or class the error message came from
      method - The method or function the error message came from
      Returns:
      A string formatted with the error message, object, method, and date of error

    • mostRecent

      public static int mostRecent​(java.sql.Connection conn, java.lang.String table)
      Returns the most recent address, occupation, or person based on ID in the database
      Parameters:
      conn - The MySQL connection
      table - The table that the prepared statement will get the highest ID from
      Returns:
      An integer of he id of the most recent item in a given table

    • exists

      public boolean exists​(jackstockley.addressbook.Address newAddress, java.sql.Connection conn)
      Checks if a newly created address was added to the database
      Parameters:
      newAddress - The new address that was inserted
      conn - The MySQL connection
      Returns:
      True if the address was added to the database otherwise false

    • exists

      Checks if a newly created occupation was added to the database
      Parameters:
      newOccupation - The new occupation that was inserted
      conn - The MySL connection
      Returns:
      True if the occupation was added otherwise false

    • exists

      public boolean exists​(jackstockley.addressbook.Person newPerson, java.sql.Connection conn)
      Checks if a newly created person was added to the database
      Parameters:
      newPerson - The new person that was inserted
      conn - The MySQL connection
      Returns:
      True if the person was added otherwise false

    • split

      public static java.lang.String split​(java.lang.String word)
      Takes in a string with no spaces and adds a space whenever the word has a capital letter
      Parameters:
      word - String with capital letter and no spaces
      Returns:
      String with capital letter and spaces

    • dirFixer

      public static java.lang.String dirFixer​(java.lang.String dir)
      Makes sure the directory when saving files is valid and doesn't include the bin folder or AddressBook.jar
      Parameters:
      dir - The current directory of the jar file
      Returns:
      The fixed directory not including AddressBook.jar or the bin folder
